Plot: Imran Ahmed hates kids because of past incidents in his life. Everything in his life is perfect, until a five year old girl Pari lands on his door claiming to be his daughter.
Title: Daddy
Writer: Zain Raza (dialogue), Zain Raza (screenplay), Zain Raza (story)
Actors: Shaood Alvi, Mariyam Khalif, Umair Leghari
